scripts.package: npm run build && gulp version && cd ../.. && tfx extension create --rev-version --bypass-validation --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.upload-local: cross-env-shell "npm run package && cd ../.. && tfx build tasks upload --task-path PnPPowerShell\PnPPowerShellV1\ --overwrite true --service-url https://dev.azure.com/Mastaq --token $VSTS_TOKEN"
scripts.vsts-publish: cross-env-shell "npm run package && cd ../.. && tfx extension publish --rev-version --token $VSTS_TOKEN"
